title: Closet.Enter
Closet.Door
body:
<<if visited("Closet.Key")>>
     [[Closet.Door_Unlock]]   
<<else>>
    The door won't budge! It's <j>locked!</j>
<<endif>>

// Let's make it so you have to melt the key in the two fires before you can leave???

title: Closet.Key
body:
Wow, a key made of <c=blue>ice!</c> How novel!

I bet this will work in that door's <c=blue>ice key</c> shaped keyhole...

// Remove key sprite
<<pickup IceKey>>

title: Closet.Door_Unlock
body:
The door is open and the next chapter in this game can continue!!!

<<await transition SceneManager>>

...

...

OH MY GOD THIS ROOM IS ON FIRE AND I AM GOING TO BURN TO DEATH IN THREE MINUTES!!!

title: Room.Fire_1
body: OH MY GOD THERE IS AN OPEN FIRE RIGHT HERE WHAT HAPPENED???
